Comment: Here is a direct link to the event in Washington DC: https://www.mobilize.us/handsoff/event/764186/  But if you check the main page at handsoff, you can look for events more local to you.    There are almost certainly other events going on.  Check the [TeslaTakedown page](https://actionnetwork.org/event_campaigns/teslatakedown) for ongoing anti-tesla events.
